attributes.action: set a goal that ensures UK Citizens wait no more than 5 minutes to enter UK at ports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since 7/7 the Immigration service has failed to alter it's modus operandi at British airports to ensure fast and efficient entry for British (and EU) Citizens. It is now a shorter wait for aliens to enter Britian than for locals. The average wait can now exceed 30 minutes. We ask the Prime Minister to ensure that UK Citizens are welcomed home with a suitably short time to clear immigration i.e. 5 minutes maximum
